alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Madison, Cook, Berrien, Lanier, Lowndes, central Brooks and southeastern Colquitt Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Sparks to near Quitman to near Madison. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Valdosta, Madison, Lake Park, Lakeland, Quitman, Hahira, Sparks, Ray City, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Morven, Lee, Cecil, Ellenton and Reed Bingham State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
